mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mvcboard(name, title, content, ofile, sfile, pass) VALUES (#{name}, #{title}, #{content}, #{ofile}, #{sfile}, #{pass})
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mvcboard
WHERE
title like concat('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
content like concat('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
ORDER BY idx DESC

SELECT * FROM (SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS ROWNUM, b.* FROM mvcboard b,(SELECT @ROWNUM := 0 ) TMP
WHERE
title like concat('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
content like concat('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
ORDER BY idx DESC ) T WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
